DOC.brief_summary: This is an efficacy and safety study of Vytorin (ezetimibe (+) simvastatin) compared to atorvastatin (ezetimibe/simvastatin) at week 6 in primary hypercholesterolemia patients in Korea. The primary hypothesis being tested is that daily administration of Vytorin will result in a greater reduction of low density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C) concentration from baseline after 6 weeks treatment compared to atorvastatin.
DOC.brief_title: Ezetimibe Plus (+) Simvastatin Versus Atorvastatin Comparative Study (0653A-092)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of hypercholesterolemia LDLC >/= 130 mg/dL but </=250 mg/dL and triglyceride (TG) </= 350 mg/dL National Cholesterol Education Program (NCEP) Adult Treatment Panel (ATP) III guideline Hypersensitivity to 3hydroxy3methylglutarylCoA reductase (HMGCoA reductase) inhibitors or Ezetimibe
